dashboard.label: Azure Active Directory CIS [L1/IG1] Benchmark : Security Posture Continuous Assurance

search.query:
`ssphp_metrics_index` ssphp.use_case.id="azure_000" earliest=-1d@d latest=now [| search `ssphp_metrics_index` ssphp.use_case.id="azure_000" earliest=-1d@d latest=now | stats max(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN | return SSPHP_RUN]
| table ssphp.score.score
| append [| makeresults | eval ssphp.score.score="-" | fields - _time] | sort - ssphp.score.score | head 1

`ssphp_metrics_index` ssphp.use_case.id="m365_001_000" earliest=-1d@d latest=now [| search `ssphp_metrics_index` ssphp.use_case.id="m365_001_000" earliest=-1d@d latest=now | stats max(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN | return SSPHP_RUN]
| table ssphp.score.score
| append [| makeresults | eval ssphp.score.score="-" | fields - _time] | sort - ssphp.score.score | head 1

index="ssphp_metrics_summary" (ssphp.use_case.id="aad*" OR ssphp.use_case.id="azure_001*") ssphp.use_case.id!="*_000" $tkn_show_l1$ $tkn_show_ig$
[| search index="ssphp_metrics_summary" (ssphp.use_case.id="aad*" OR ssphp.use_case.id="azure_001*") ssphp.use_case.id!="*_000" | stats max(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN by ssphp.use_case.id | eval search_text="(\"ssphp.use_case.id\"=\"".'ssphp.use_case.id'."\" AND SSPHP_RUN=\"".SSPHP_RUN."\")" | stats values(search_text) as search_text | eval search_text="(".mvjoin(search_text," OR ").")" | return $search_text]
| eval Score='ssphp.score.score'."|".'ssphp.score.color', ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.v8=split('ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.v8'," "), ssphp.use_case.description=coalesce('ssphp.use_case.description','ssphp.cis_benchmark.control.description')
| search Score=*
``` Eliminate all the Use Cases which have a current status set to "exclude" ``` | join type=outer ssphp.use_case.id [| search index="ssphp_metrics_summary" ssphp.type="exclusion" earliest=0 latest=now | sort 0 - SSPHP_RUN | eval ssphp.dfe_benchmark.exclusion.status=case('ssphp.dfe_benchmark.exclusion.status'="TRUE","exclude", 'ssphp.dfe_benchmark.exclusion.status'="FALSE","include", 1==1,'ssphp.dfe_benchmark.exclusion.status'), ssphp.dfe_benchmark.exclusion.updated=strftime(SSPHP_RUN,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | stats list(ssphp.dfe_benchmark.exclusion.*) as *, max(ssphp.dfe_benchmark.exclusion.updated) as last_updated by ssphp.use_case.id | eval current_status=mvindex(status,mvfind(updated,'last_updated')) | sort 0 ssphp.use_case.id | fields ssphp.use_case.id, current_status]
| fillnull value="include" current_status | search current_status="$tkn_show_ex$"
| table ssphp.use_case.id, ssphp.use_case.title, Score, ssphp.cis_benchmark.control.title, ssphp.use_case.description, ssphp.cis_benchmark.control.level, ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.ig1, current_status
| rename ssphp.use_case.title as "Title", ssphp.use_case.short_description as "Name" ssphp.use_case.description as "Description", ssphp.cis_benchmark.control.title as "Control Title", ssphp.cis_benchmark.control.level as "Level", current_status as "Exclusion Status", ssphp.cis_benchmark.controls.ig1 as "IG1 Status"
| sort 0 Title
``` sort the lines properly ``` ```| rex field=ssphp.use_case.id "^aad_00[0-9]{1}_cis_(?<n1>[^-]*)-(?<n2>[^-]*)" | rex field=ssphp.use_case.id "^aad_00[0-9]{1}_cis_[^-]*-[^-]*-(?<n3>.*)$" | fillnull value=0 n1, n2, n3 | eval n2="00".n2, n2=substr(n2,len(n2)-1,2), n3="00".n3, n3=substr(n3,len(n3)-1,2), sort_field='n1'.'n2'.'n3', sort_field=replace(sort_field,"00000","99999") | sort 0 sort_field, ssphp.use_case.id | fields - sort_field, n1, n2, n3```
``` i just put this in because i misnamed the controls (missed a -) so i wanted them out of the dashboard, but it will need to come out when the score have aged out``` | search NOT (Title="AAD 001 [CIS 1.22]" OR Title="AAD 001 [CIS 1.23]" OR Title="AAD 001 [CIS 1.24]")
